title: Melf's Acid Arrow
content:
Melf's Acid Arrow Level 2 Evocation Spell 6~24 Damage 4d4 Acid+2d4 +2d4 Acid (Delayed) Shoot a green arrow that covers the target and the ground with acid. Deals 4~16 Acid damage immediately and 2~8 Acid damage at the end of the target's turn. 1 turn On Miss: Targets still takes half the initial damage. 18m Action Level 1 Spell Slot
